#include <string>
#include <iostream>

struct Point
{
    int x,y;
};

void process(int row,int col,int testcase)
{
    int output[102][102]={0},count=0;
    Point points[100];
    std::string input;
    
	for(int i=0;i<row;i++)
	{
		std::cin >> input;
		for(int j=0;j<input.size();j++)
		{
		    if(input[j] == '*')
		    {
		        points[count].x=i+1;
		        points[count].y=j+1;
		        output[i+1][j+1]=-1;
		        count++;
		    }
		}
	}

    for(int i=0;i<count;i++)
    {
        int x=points[i].x;
        int y=points[i].y;
        
        if(output[x-1][y]!=-1)
            output[x-1][y]++;
        if(output[x+1][y]!=-1)
            output[x+1][y]++;
        if(output[x][y-1]!=-1)
            output[x][y-1]++;
        if(output[x][y+1]!=-1)
            output[x][y+1]++;
        if(output[x-1][y-1]!=-1)
            output[x-1][y-1]++;
        if(output[x+1][y+1]!=-1)
            output[x+1][y+1]++;
        if(output[x-1][y+1]!=-1)
            output[x-1][y+1]++;
        if(output[x+1][y-1]!=-1)
            output[x+1][y-1]++;
    }
    std::cout << "Field #" << testcase << ":" << std::endl;
    for(int i=1;i<row+1;i++)
    {
        for(int j=1;j<col+1;j++)
        {
            if(output[i][j]!=-1)
                std::cout << output[i][j];
            else
                std::cout << '*';
        }
        std::cout << std::endl;
    }
}

int main()
{
    int row,col,testcase=0;
    
    std::cin >> row >> col;
    while(row && col)
    {
        testcase++;
        process(row,col,testcase);
        std::cin >> row >> col;
    }
    return 0;
}
